articles.title: Apple iPad mini (2021) prices quietly went up yesterday - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The mini tablet costs the same as it did at launch in the US and Canada, but it suddenly got more expensive in Europe and Asia.

articles.title: Lessons from the Arctic about an Indigenous Voice to Parliament - ABC News
articles.description: Northern Europe's Indigenous people, the Sámi, say their way of life is being threatened by a wave of "green colonialism". Can their voices to parliament save them?
articles.content:
A wave of "green colonisation" is threatening an Indigenous people's way of life in the Arctic. Can having a voice to parliament save it?

articles.author: Katie Hunt
articles.title: The Black Death is still affecting the human immune system - CNN
articles.description: The Black Death, the world's most devastating plague outbreak, killed half of medieval Europe's population in the space of seven years, shifting the course of human history. It was more than luck that determined who died and who survived, a new study says.
